divs: Sighting DetailsIll make this brief, 1st ufo has been around my house for several weeks. Does show a pattern in directional changes. Rectangle, with 4 smaller rectangles at each corner. Sometimes pulses, but it's not bright. At first I thought it was a safelight catching the sun, then it came back, but from a different direction and light pulse patterns. It also becomes extremely bright, bright enough to compete with the moon when it's full. I don't want to sound crazy but, when it is about to appear, I get a feeling that someone is watching. When this happens not to far afterwards this object appears. I've woken out of a dead sleep from this feeling, almost like a trained Marine Recon Sniper. Similar feeling occurs with the second object. Second object(s) 2 white balls of light that are somewhat transparant, but isn't... If that makes anysense. Walking along a busy street and two appear out of nowhere. After I got over the shock at how close they were, I reached for my phone to take a picture, and then when I returned my attention to the objects, they were gone. Funny thing is, when I was going on my walk, I was thinking to myself "I wonder if ill ever be able to see a ufo type object in the daylight." Well, sort answer...yup. Before this appeared same feeling, like someone was watching me.
Summary: 2 ufos. First one red rectangle pulses and brightens. Sphere, white some what clear Dissappers
